title: FoodieApp Restaurant Discovery
description: AI-powered restaurant discovery app with personalized recommendations and social dining features.
challenge: FoodieApp wanted to differentiate in the crowded restaurant app market by offering hyper-personalized recommendations based on dietary preferences, mood, and social dining patterns while building a community of food enthusiasts.
solution: We developed a mobile app with AI that learns user preferences, AR menu previews, group dining coordination, and influencer-curated lists. The design features mouth-watering food photography and smooth gesture-based navigation.
results: 4.8 star rating on App Store and Google Play
Acquired by major food delivery platform
